blockdumper.title: Block Dumper
blockdumper.warning.epilepsy:
BlockDumper piggybacks Minecraft's rendering system. All renders appear on-screen.
If you are prone to seizures due to flashing lights, please exercise caution.
blockdumper.options.rendersize.fit: Make sure preview fits on screen!
blockdumper.render.title: Render Progress
blockdumper.render.too_small: Window too small! Please expand it so the render fits.
